data.name: Hero_Title
data.value: Turn Your SaaS Idea Into Reality

data.name: Hero_Subtitle
data.value: This is a sample startup built with CodeBlock.DevKit. Everything you see here comes from built-in modules - no coding required. Simply customize the design, content, and features to match your vision, then launch your own startup.

data.name: System_Access_Subtitle
data.value: First run the web apps from src/2-clients, then click on any component below to see what CodeBlock.DevKit provides

data.name: AI_Section_Description
data.value: At "It Can Be Yours", we've integrated cutting-edge AI technology to provide instant, intelligent support. Our AI assistant has been trained on our knowledge base and can answer questions about our services, pricing, and more.

data.name: AI_User_Question
data.value: How can you help my business scale?

data.name: AI_Response
data.value: Great question! I can guide you through our digital transformation services, recommend the right plan based on your needs, and explain how our platform integrates with your existing systems. Would you like to know more about any specific area?

data.name: AI_Feature_DocumentProcessing_Desc
data.value: AI trained on our entire knowledge base and documentation

data.name: AI_Feature_24x7_Availability_Desc
data.value: Instant responses any time, with escalation to human agents

data.name: AI_Feature_ContinuousLearning_Desc
data.value: Gets smarter over time based on interactions and feedback

data.name: AI_DevKit_Integration_Alert
data.value: DevKit AI Integration: This AI functionality comes built-in with CodeBlock.DevKit! Simply provide your AI model API key (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.), embed your documents, and get a fully functional AI assistant for your startup. No complex setup required!

data.name: Pricing_Section_Title
data.value: Sample Pricing Plans for Your Startup

data.name: Pricing_Section_Description
data.value: These are sample pricing plans to demonstrate how you can structure your startup's monetization. Simply define pricing plans that fit your goals and vision - the platform makes it easy to customize any pricing model for your business.

data.name: Pricing_Demo_Alert
data.value: Pricing Demo: These are sample pricing plans for this demo startup. With CodeBlock.DevKit, you can create any pricing structure, features, and business model that fits your startup idea.

data.name: Features_Section_Description
data.value: At "It Can Be Yours", we provide everything businesses need to establish and grow their digital presence. Our comprehensive platform covers all aspects of modern business operations.

data.name: Feature_CustomerManagement_Description
data.value: Advanced customer relationship management with user dashboards, account management, and personalized experiences for your clients.

data.name: Feature_BusinessAnalytics_Description
data.value: Comprehensive analytics and reporting dashboard to track your business performance, customer behavior, and growth metrics in real-time.

data.name: CTA_Final_Title
data.value: Ready to Build Your Own Success Story?

data.name: CTA_Final_Description
data.value: You've explored what's possible with "It Can Be Yours" - a complete SaaS business built entirely with CodeBlock.DevKit. Now imagine creating your own startup with the same powerful foundation, customized for your unique vision and goals.

data.name: CTA_DevKit_Info
data.value: What is CodeBlock.DevKit? A comprehensive SaaS development framework that helps entrepreneurs launch their startups faster. documentation, and everything you need to build your own "It Can Be Yours" success story.

data.name: Steps_Section_Title
data.value: Follow These 6 Steps to Launch Your Startup

data.name: Step_2_Description
data.value: Use AI agents like Cursor, ChatGPT, etc. to design your website and follow the docs to replace it with the current website.

data.name: Step_3_Description
data.value: Use our docs to learn the architecture and patterns for implementing high-quality business logic. Discover how simple it is to integrate your business logic with existing DevKit modules.

data.name: Step_4_Description
data.value: Simply use the Admin Panel pricing section to define your plans and discounts. Everything is ready to set up your monetization strategy effortlessly.

data.name: Step_5_Description
data.value: Just provide an API key from OpenAI, Google, or other AI providers, plus some business documents, and you'll have a well-designed chatbot and widget for user interaction.

data.name: Step_6_Description
data.value: Deploy anywhere you want. It's a cross-platform .NET application that can be deployed to Windows, Linux, and other platforms with ease.

data.name: Video_Section_Title
data.value: Want to See How It's Done?

data.name: Video_Section_Description
data.value: Watch a complete walkthrough of building a startup from scratch, then follow the same process for your own venture.

data.name: Video_Button_Text
data.value: Watch a Sample Startup Launch with CodeBlock DevKit

data.name: Step_1_Description
data.value: CodeBlock has comprehensive documentation that covers everything you need to know about launching a startup using the DevKit.

data.name: Privacy_Introduction
data.value: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our application and services.

data.name: Privacy_InformationWeCollect_Content
data.value:
When you use our platform, we may collect the following information:

  • Email address: Used to create and manage your account, as well as to send password recovery emails if requested.
  • Basic profile information: This may include your name or profile picture if provided by the external login provider.

We only collect information that is necessary to provide and improve our services.

data.name: Privacy_HowWeUseInfo_Content
data.value:
We use your information for the following purposes:

  • To authenticate your identity and log you into our platform.
  • To manage your account and provide essential account-related communications.
  • To send you password recovery emails if requested by you.

We do not sell, share, or use your information for marketing purposes.

data.name: Privacy_DataSharing_Content
data.value: We do not share your data with third parties, except when required by law or to comply with the terms of the external login providers (e.g., Google, Microsoft, Twitter, Facebook).

data.name: Privacy_DataRetention_Content
data.value: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. If you choose to delete your account, we will remove your data from our systems within a reasonable timeframe.

data.name: Privacy_SecurityMeasures_Content
data.value: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

data.name: Privacy_YourRights_Content
data.value:
You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

  • Access: You can request a copy of the information we hold about you.
  • Correction: You can request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information.
  • Deletion: You can request the deletion of your account and associated data.

data.name: Privacy_PolicyChanges_Content
data.value: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the Effective Date will be updated accordingly.

data.name: Terms_Introduction
data.value: Welcome to our platform! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our application and its associated features.

data.name: Terms_ExternalLogin_Content
data.value: Our platform allows you to log in using third-party providers, including but not limited to Google, Microsoft, Twitter, and Facebook. By using these external login services, you agree to the respective terms and policies of the login provider you select.

data.name: Terms_EmailUsage_Content
data.value:
When you log in through any external provider, we may request access to your email address. This email address is used for the following purposes:

  • To create and manage your account on our platform.
  • To use as your username for authentication purposes.
  • To send password recovery emails, if requested by you.

We do not use your email address for marketing purposes, share it with third parties, or utilize it for any other goals.

data.name: Terms_PrivacyHandling_Content
data.value: We prioritize your privacy and handle your information in compliance with our Privacy Policy. Any data obtained during the login process will only be used to facilitate your access to our platform.

data.name: Terms_ProviderResponsibility_Content
data.value: By using an external login provider, you agree to the terms, conditions, and privacy policies of that provider. We are not responsible for any actions taken by external login services.

data.name: Terms_AccountResponsibility_Content
data.value: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Please contact us immediately if you believe your account has been compromised.

data.name: Terms_Modifications_Content
data.value: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. If significant changes are made, we will notify you through our platform or via email.

data.name: Terms_ContactUsInfo
data.value: If you have any questions about our policies or how we handle your data, please contact us.

data.name: Terms_AgreeToPolicy
data.value: By using our platform, you agree to this policy.

data.name: Terms_AgreeToTerms
data.value: By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service.

data.name: Terms_ThankYou
data.value: Thank you for using our platform!
